clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: Mild inflammatory uptake in adrenal gland region.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in adrenal gland, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
